website_summaries.verdict: Combines a great price and a slew of features along with the ability to bend the string to suit your needs.
pros: Comes with a number of different setting and options, as well as a remote to control them all
A great look at an unbeatable price
The wire is stiff, so you can bend or form the string however you wish
cons: The remote is IR and very small, so you’ll have to point it right at the controller to get it to work
Prepare to spend a little time untangling the string right out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Controller overheat issues are fixed with the new black controller
customer_reviews.text: I am revising my review as the seller has upgraded the controller and it no longer over heats. This really is a cute string of lights and the remote is VERY convenient. The new controller is black, so if you have or receive the old white controller, make sure to feel it as it's plugged in to see if it gets hot. If the controller overheats, the sting will fail at the least and melt at the worst. Their customer service is very responsive and attentive. They made it right for me.
customer_reviews.author: The Chadd

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The remote didn't work at first but the seller replaced the remote and receiver and they work great now. I'm very happy with the product and especially the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Camdilly

customer_reviews.title: These lights are wonderful! My initial idea was regular holiday tree light
customer_reviews.text: These lights are wonderful! My initial idea was regular holiday tree light, but they were too bulky and heavy....So I found these! They are light-weight, beautifully lit and just great with the remote control for power and display options. They are so thin and light they are invisible in the canopy. The perfect back- light for a tween on her Ipad. Love-em! and the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: DElivingfun

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE LIGHTS! VERY BRIGHT AND VERY LONG!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I was VERY PLEASED with these lights! They were much brighter than I expected and the length of the strain of lights is very long! I had some battery operated LED lights, similar to these, however, though they were LED's the batteries would drain quite often, even when not in use. The idea of plugging the lights in was appealing, plus being able to power the lights on and off with the remote was another nice addition to this unit. I also liked that you could dim the lights with the remote as well. I added the lights to the center of my dinning room table. Photos included. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Eric WheelwrightTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Looks so good and was just the right length for a queen ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who used it to outline his bed. Looks so good and was just the right length for a queen size. Only issue was the control box was broken. I'm sure I could have returned it for another one, but my friend said it was really easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: MarniTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars to 1 Star
customer_reviews.text: These look great on our balcony! Planning to buy more, because I got cute ideas from the customer photos. Update 1/18/17 - I changed my review from 5 stars to 1 because half of the strand stopped working tonight. They were delivered on 11/3/16. To not even last for the 1st 2.5 months is pretty lame. Man, I really loved having these on my apt balcony and was planning to get more. Wish they had lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: MMor

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Classroom BUT wait...
customer_reviews.text: I used these lights to make a bulletin board frame sparkle! My students love the lights, and the name of the board is "news flash" so the lights remind them to pay attention to the school info posted there! Im very angry to report that since my last review I attempted to hang 2 sets of these lights in my bedroom and they stopped working all together. When I was telling my mom about this, she said she had the exact same problem. Work fine for a while, attepmt to move and they stop working. Only 2 lights at the very end of the strand light up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J.Lanich

customer_reviews.title: Plugged in for the first time straight out of the ackage worked for a second before they just quit!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughters birthday when she got them we opened them to hang up in her room when I plugged them in they worked for just a second before flickering and going out. Would not ever come back on so basically I wasted about $15 which is just not acceptable. Went to Target found super cute ones for half the price which have been working now for about 5-6 mos. I would not recommend these lights and if you do purchase be sure to check them as soon as you receive them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: Bright and warm
customer_reviews.text: Great lights. Warm yet bright . Just what I needed. I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Roll The Dice
customer_reviews.text: Well, I had high hopes for this string-but it died in just over 5 weeks-just outside of the return window. Talk about disappointing! It gave no warning that something was wrong with it-it just died. A string of lights for this price should last at least 6 months-not JUST over a month. Pretty bad in my opinion...Then again, it may just be hit or miss with ANY of these copper light sets. I have another brand in my kitchen so we'll see about that one.
customer_reviews.author: Infiniti

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly inside my closet
customer_reviews.text: I used this string light inside a closet with a large opening. The light in that closet has never been adequate, I should have hung these lights long ago. I recently removed the closet doors to create more space and the dimmable feature has come in very handy. Works exactly the way I hoped it would. The light is yellow toned, which is what I prefer over blue. I hung this string light using tiny 3M hooks.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlin mckenna

customer_reviews.title: VERY FRAGILE
customer_reviews.text: These lights are so beautiful, but SO fragile. They were wonderful for 5 minutes until the copper wire tore and took out the rest of the strand rendering them useless. I considered buying another set, but they are just too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lois

customer_reviews.title: The Creative in me is in LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! I literally ordered 2 packs withib days of each other. I'm not sure what people want to know reading these reviews but I'm visual so I added pics and a video. I'm not sure about how they do outdoors. I have them in my apartment and one remote controls both set of lights. I didn't want to get an actual lamp so this is my alternative .
customer_reviews.author: K.igori07

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if not so dark
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these lights after reading the reviews. Once hung, they look very clean/minimal, are not really noticeable- exactly what we wanted! However, after we got them perfectly hung, we discovered that they are really super dim. Even at 100% brightness, they are dark mood lighting at best. Not sure if we just happened to get a bad batch or what, but they really just aren’t quite bright enough for what we wanted. Only complaint is how dark they are. Bummer. EDIT - The seller reached out months later to refund our purchase since we were unhappy with the lights. Their customer service made me raise from 2/5 stars to 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lights themselves are fine. Not too bright
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 sets of these lights, two to light up a pallet bed and one for another room. The remotes do not work, even with new batteries. One set would not turn on at all and were returned. The lights themselves are fine. Not too bright, which is good, because with the functionality of the remotes being so spotty she is leaving them on all the time and if they were brighter she would never sleep. I would just return all of them, but we already put them in place and it would be a hassle to disassemble the bed again to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: mlph

customer_reviews.title: These string lights are perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These string lights are perfect for what I wanted. I bought a strand of small driftwood and wound the lights around the pieces and hung it up. The display is beautiful at night. So happy with the product and it was so easy to twist and bend.
customer_reviews.author: James Howe

customer_reviews.title: Half of the items work😒
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my daughter a few months ago for Christmas knowing I’ll be using it when we redo her room. So now I’m just now opening the item and the led controller battery (that operates without having to plug in the wall and the remote) DOES NOT work!! I’ve googled and went to YouTube to make sure I’m using it right though it’s sooo simple but no lights and it’s to late to return the item😡. So I won’t be able to use the remote but the wall cord works and the lights are nice🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Sherri N.

customer_reviews.title: Cannot withstand the elements -- proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.text: It may have been using them outdoors but both the first set I bought and then the replacement set that was sent out by the manufacturer were both faulty and stopped working within about 4-6 weeks. I can't recommend this product outside and the manufacturer should be requesting returns on defective units to properly evaluate why they are failing or stop selling them as labeled for outdoor use. I cannot speak to using them inside because I didn't use them that way. But I am going back to a more rugged cable because I believe the copper is so thin it cannot withstand the elements -- and I live in very mild weather in Southern California!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Galli

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Great lights - ordered 3 sets. 2 set of white lights and 1 multicolor one. One of the lights was to replace one given as a gift (from a different company) that didn't have remote control and they were the same price. Remote is great for my kids who use it to decorate and light up their room. They like the ability to turn off the lights from bed. Only thing they wish it had was a timer because they fall asleep in bed and forget to turn it off. I've included a photo of the heart my daughter put above her bed. It's kind of sideways because I don't know how to rotate this photo for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Travelling mom

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, cosy, convenient
customer_reviews.text: That is so lovely light strings for my room. I have purchased for so many time as a gift, or for myself. I am really satisfied. The light comes with warm bright! Make your room feels cosy. You guys should have it to make your decoration more pretty! It also comes with the remote control so that you can control it without unplug the source!
customer_reviews.author: Tad

customer_reviews.title: Product has improved since my last order
customer_reviews.text: Works great, plenty of brightness, and with a remote control that is actually practical and simple. It also now has a less bulky transformer box than on earlier versions, that detaches from the light string, with a generous amount of cord. A versatile product in which you can easily bend the lamp string to fit the form of your lamp casing or sculpture. I make 3-D stained glass technique squid sconce lamps, about 20" high, and can easily snake the light strings through the tentacles and have plenty left over to light op their bodies.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Parker

customer_reviews.title: 1,000% recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've had/used this product now for over 2 years, and I've never had a single problem... even after I accidentally vacuumed most of it up and had to pull it back out from the vacuum (which I don't recommend- I was a little nervous I was going to start a fire or something when I first replugged it in, but it was like nothing even happened). The copper wire is malleable, but holds it's own, and the lights go from dim to pretty bright depending on the setting. My remote is still going strong and I've used this for countless hours over the years. This is as awesome of a product as you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Candice G.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for speak out game
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I read some other reviews that said they were poorly made but I didn't think so. I purchased them to play the Speak Out game at my daughters birthday sleepover. They are all in 4th grade and these worked perfectly. The adults even played as well. None of them broke and the price was great considering we threw them away after using.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: We own multiple sets!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer support! We’ve had these lights a little over a year. Somehow my husband disconnected the power cord from the tree and well, it’s in our basement, a place I do not venture because I would never find my way out! TaoTronics customer support worked with me, they are sending another adapter. It was fast and curtious and I am a customer for life. I also love these lights. We have multiple sets that we use on our indoor trees. They are just the right amount of light Adjustable with brightness and do not weigh down the thin branches.
customer_reviews.author: Kctco

customer_reviews.title: Adds a Nice Glow
customer_reviews.text: These lights add a nice, warm glow. Since they're LED, flickering is noticeable when the brightness is turned down low, but that doesn't bother me since that is inherent to LED technology. Overall, great product. I was honestly surprised at how far these string lights went! (Although, I probably shouldn't have been surprised. 33 feet is 33 feet. I guess I needed a frame of reference prior to being surprised.) Recommended buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Joy Covey

customer_reviews.title: Not For Outside Use as Described
customer_reviews.text: The lights are nice, but the remote never worked. It would have been nice to dim them sometimes. The seller says they are waterproof, but they are not. The LED controller failed from water intrusion in one year. I sent a request for replacement to the seller, but I am not hopeful. It has been over a year since I bought them. If you can use them inside, I think they would be fine. I may try another set, this time waterproofing or concealing the LED controller.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Moff

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two and a half months before dying.
customer_reviews.text: The lights were very pretty when we first bought them for our patio and they were easy to put up. After several weeks, we noticed they were dimmer than when first put up. Upon inspection, we figured out that if we wiggled some of the wires near the end of the light rope, the lights would brighten again. We went through this process many times, until finally, after two and a half months, they no longer work.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.D.

customer_reviews.title: Bright punch - little package!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted Christmas lights in her bedroom. We hung two strings of incandescent colored bulbs. One of the strings began to die a slow death, bulb by bulb, and so we opted to replace with these LED light strings which had great reviews. So far so good! The only reason for the 1-star deduction is because we haven't been using them for very long, and so I'm holding back the final star for build-quality and longevity. And my daughter wishes they were available in multi-color LEDs like her old Christmas light string...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lins

customer_reviews.title: Lights caused tree to start smoking!
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved these lights and was planning on buying more but then I noticed that the top third (on my mini tree inside the house) went out. I have only been using the lights for maybe one week. Then I was sitting there and I heard a pop and my artificial tree was smoldering and smoking!!! So dangerous!! Loved them til that happened... The remote and varying brightness was great. Too bad so defective.
customer_reviews.author: avril

customer_reviews.title: Different colors of lights
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE (6/2020)- the seller sent me new lights to fix the issue of some yellow/ some white. Very kind of them. Great service! Thanks The lights are surprisingly bright on the brightest setting but the many levels of brightness are nice. The one thing that’s driving me crazy though is that some lights are bright white and others are yellow! I don’t care which color the strand is as long as it’s all the same. This is patchy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights, they create such a nice atmosphere in my room. The lights themselves are very bright. However I waited so long to actually test them out and now I cant return them and the remote doesn't work at all I can sometimes get them to turn on but can't get them to turn off, can't dim them or change the settings. I haven't seen anything like this in the reviews so maybe I just got a bad one. Either way I'm very disappointed. Edit* The company contacted me right away after writing the review and sent me a replacement, the new ones work perfectly and I am very happy with them. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Ashley speca

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Lights are exactly what we wanted. The remote is to be desired though. You must be practically right on them in order for it to operate them. Lights are very nice though. Update: just bought a second set and will order more in the future. Does what we need them to do. Remote control function is still the only real downfall of these lights. Only works if you are on top of them. No biggie really but would be nice so i don't have to learn yoga to point the remote at the receiver since ours are under the bed towards the headboard lol. Life goes on...
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Botkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Source of Light
customer_reviews.text: I already bought like three of these. They are great for gifts and they can even be used as lights for the holidays. The control is kind of glitchy from time to time but it hasn't really caused any stress. The lights are dim but I rely entirely on them to light up my room now. You can dim them even further to use them as night lights. They don't release any heat so you can wrap them around anything. I know I will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Coenocytic

customer_reviews.title: Cool Copper Wire Lots
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights! They are dainty, easy to place, inconspicuous, and lend a warmth to the room. I'd recommend these lights to anyone. The remote control is such an asset and works great. It has many more features than I need at this time, but I'm sure I'll enjoy more of the possibilities in the future. We're using them on our mantle, amongst the Christmas greenery, and all around our beautiful nativity.
customer_reviews.author: J. Denise Ragsdale

customer_reviews.title: Great mood lighting in any room
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked this style of lights just for room lighting in the tv room. Having one that is dimmable like this is great! I keep them on the lowest setting but if I’m needing more light it’s so nice to quickly have it with one touch. The amusing thing is that the up and down arrows raise and lower the volume on my TV. I’m fine with it for now as I generally keep it on one setting most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: tjwash

customer_reviews.title: Brand Inconsistancy!
customer_reviews.text: As you see in the picture, I set up 3 sets of these lights around my backstage so we get a nicer, more pleasant lighting (florencent bulbs just wear you down when you have to stay back there all day long). 2 of the 3 we ordered, on the left side, were a slightly warm white, but the third, on the right, has a very warm white color. We set these up using zip ties already, and by the time we tested it, it was already installed. It would be a hassle to take down so I don't think we will return them, but we are very dissapointed that the bulbs aren't the same!
customer_reviews.author: Dav

customer_reviews.title: Remote only worked one time
customer_reviews.text: I plugged in the string of lights and turned them on with the remote. The lights are bright. I was not able to dim the lights or even turn off the lights using the remote again. Then I was not able to turn them on again with the remote. Changing the battery did not help so I am returning the product. However, the lights are pretty and they sparkle so I am ordering the same set from a different seller in hopes that the remote will work.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great value - BUT not “warm”
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights, and the price is hard to beat. The plugin option means you don’t need batteries. And the remote control is super convenient. Amazing value!!! My only disappointment was they weren’t really “warm” in color - even though they were advertised as such. They emit a cool glow. The lower the setting, the warmer they will look however. I wrapped them around a lamp base and put the rest in a mason jar on the night stand. Looks great :)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gwillim

customer_reviews.title: More than what I thought I'd be getting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the bottom portion of a bar cart. The length of the lights seemed like it was never ending, which is awesome. The lights are bright but delicate, the remote is small and straightforward. I love the options to change the speed and brightness of the lights. I leave them plugged in and the remote is across the the room and I can turn the lights on from there. I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah

customer_reviews.title: Such pretty, delicate lights!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these lights. So easy to wrap around things and position nicely, and the remote is next level. Way better than christmas or other string lights. I hope they last a while because I am so happy with how they look!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat+Jin

customer_reviews.title: Faulty remote
customer_reviews.text: Update 8/9/20: Company sent me 2 new packs of lights that are functional. Changed review from one star to three. They sent the replacement many months after my original review. 5/5 customer service though with the replacements. Original review: I was sent a remote/remote receiver that is malfunctioning. The lights light up for 1 second when I press power, but do not stay on. The lights function fine when plugged in directly, but I purchased this for the remote control. Either my remote or the remote receiver is faulty and is not working. Unhappy, and I wish my remote functioned. The lights look good when hung up.
customer_reviews.author: HCA

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: When these first showed up and I pulled them out of the box I was very disappointed. They are tiny, tiny dots on the string, and I thought they were actual bulbs. I bought them to go around my fireplace to add ambience and low lighting to my living room. But, by the looks of these I didn't think they were add much light. I was wrong! These were exactly what I was looking for - subtle mood lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi D.

customer_reviews.title: Get them!! They are sooo pretty
customer_reviews.text: These lights are the best!! I have three of them in my rooftop. They have stayed outside permanently through rain, snow and sun for 4 YEARS!!! And they work great! I love how you can barely see the wire when they are off or in the day time. You can detach the portion of the wire that you plug in to the wall. (I lost these parts so i have buy them again, I will get the exact same ones because they are that good)
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE LIGHTS! They are really long and bright. I have them hanging around the walls in my room. I also bought some clothes pins and I have hung pictures from them. I love all the varying brightness levels and different settings for the lights. I am so glad I bought these. I leave them on while I get ready for bed and while I read and then I can just turn them off from my bed with the remote. No need for another lamp in my room!
customer_reviews.author: Charlyne O

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man I bought 10+ sets of battery operated fairy lights. They literally would last for three days tops. I can’t even understand why people would review them positively if your spending that much money buying batteries. I wish there was a better battery operated version but until then... there are these. They really seem durable and good quality. The light is a beautiful shade, not too warm or too cool. They are very bright and make any space look great. Also comes with a multi function remote. I really love these lights!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and they work great. They have a pleasing soft white light
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and they work great. They have a pleasing soft white light. I use them as concealed lighting for a workspace. This is the second string I have purchased.I might get more. I use Command mini hooks to secure them in place.The wire is strong and flexible. There is a remote control for on/off and dimming. This string is intended for indoor use only. They also make an outdoor version which is weatherproof.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Neiswanger

customer_reviews.title: Bad remote but good lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights were cute, I put them around my daughters bed. The remote didnt work at all though. I bought 2 sets so I was able to use the other remote but that only worked for a little while then stopped working too. So now we have to plug them in and unplug them every time we use them. Other than that the lights were really cute.
customer_reviews.author: Alysse

customer_reviews.title: Super bright, but weak sensor and ugly cable
customer_reviews.text: Super bright! Love that they are dimmable. Bought them to replace some old fairy lights and they go so much brighter. Each remote works on both strands. The downsides are that the remote control distance/sensitivty isn’t great (often takes a bit of clicking around to turn off from my bed) and that the cable has a weird second wire that doesn’t look good hanging down my wall. Overall though I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Remote issues
customer_reviews.text: I can’t open the remote to put a battery in. I’ve tried everything and yes followed directions to open it. Otherwise the lights are adorable and my daughter loves them just wish the remote did what it was supposed to. UPDATE: Seller contacted me and not only sent me a new set of lights, but also refunded me. Thank you so much!! Love the lights and the remote!!!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but I couldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great value. This was exactly what I was looking for at an excellent price.... until I opened the product. Whoever wrapped these lights must have a sick sense of humor, as they were knotted in multiple spots and not easy to untangle. After an hour of trying to get the knots out, I gave up and tossed. Could be a great product, but unfortunately it was more trouble than it was worth.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Z

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much I bought six sets.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two packs of these last year and just bought 4 more sets for our house this year. We used to use regular lights on wreaths and decorations inside our house, but these are much more elegant looking since the wires and lights are so small. You can dim them, they don't flicker, they don't look blue like some LEDs....they are just great. I particularly love that you can turn them on and off with a remote control rather than fumbling around with a power cord as we did with the regular lights. Really good product. Couldn't be happier with these!
customer_reviews.author: ctx1050

customer_reviews.title: Great for the holidays or every day
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright lights. Bought this to go under a kitchen cabinet, but had thought about using it for Christmas lights before that. Nice lightweight lines made it an easy choice to adapt under the cabinet. Remote works well, and offers dim and flashing options and a bright option. Plenty of length and package was nice and compact if I wanted to roll it up and store it, say after the holidays. Great lightning buy, and I'd go back for an everyday buy to put a pair in a few other places throughout the house as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hirschauer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive amounts of alternatives!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these! I have them indoors, and they add a beautiful touch to our fireplace! I love that the remote offers so many options! Both on light strenght and blinking interval (I chose to keep them solid, but there are some good looking blinking settings too!). I am definately going to buy more of these when my other light strings runs out. These are my new favorite lights!
customer_reviews.author: ColericV

customer_reviews.title: Great little lights
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I wouldn't think this could generate enough light to illuminate a walkway....but it does ! Considering the simplicity and light weight....this is a marvel. I hope it lasts the winter. I am using it under a carport walkway that does not have access to sunlight. This very little string of lights does a more than adequate job. If the space is smaller (living room, patio walkway or covered area, these lights are quite adequate to the task. I am glad I bought a two pack since I will use the other string in our covered deck area come late spring (Oregon)
customer_reviews.author: elgreco

customer_reviews.title: Can't Use With Timer
customer_reviews.text: The lights are super cute, but be aware they are NOT able to be used with a timer! We wanted to have them come on each night for a few hours and then turn off, but they do NOT come on the next day and no way to change that feature. However, the company is anxious to have every customer be happy with their purchase, so they refunded my total price without a return!!! How often do you find that in this day and age? 🤗
customer_reviews.author: B Russell

customer_reviews.title: The remote makes these lights worth it
customer_reviews.text: Loved these lights - they are exactly the kind of warm, ethereal "fairy" lights you've seen in all those dreamy Pinterest bedrooms pictures - but the best part about these lights by far is the REMOTE!!!! There are 10 different brightness settings, which is great if you want to brighten up a cheerful living room, or have a bit of mood lighting for a bedroom. (There are also several different settings for fading and flashing the lights, though I rarely use those for the ones in my bedroom!) t's also great that I can turn the lights off from my comfy bed without having to climb out and fiddle with an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Year Around
customer_reviews.text: I Keep buying these as GIFTS. People love them. I have had them on my screen porch for 3 years. ALL bulbs still working. Leave them on all day. Set low for a nice glow at night. Easy to hang with small hooks every 5-6 feet but could be longer span. Copper wire is strong enough to stretch further. Just wrap it around the hook. A friend just stopped over and liked my lights..now they have 2 sets. August 2020 Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: These lights were bright, the issue I had was with the controller, I want to press a button and select the mode I want, not multiple buttons to approximate what I'm looking for. I would suggest 1 button pressed multiple times to select the desired mode, ie: wave, slo glow, sequential, steady-on etc. These lights were used indoors, not sure if they are meant or could stand up to outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke down a month later and I only use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke down a month later and I only use it before I go to sleep everyday. Expected more than 1 month for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Carahanw

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decorative lights
customer_reviews.text: We bought these lights to put in our inoperative fireplace, not really knowing what to expect. They are excellent! We were easily able to bend and shape the strings around the logs to get the effect we were looking for. The remote works beautifully - to turn the light on and off but most importantly, to adjust the brightness. This was the best part! I can turn them lower by day, and brighten the whole room by night. It’s surprising how much light these strings put out! And the price? Incredibly reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Bright Copper Colored Wire - requires ac power...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a few strings of lights I use for door wreaths. I had to return these lights for the following reasons: Wire is a bright shiny copper color - therefore unable to "hide" them in greenery of pine wreath. Also, these lights ARE NOT battery powered - they require ac power plug, not something that is very conducive for an application involving a entry door to my home. Otherwise, the warm color temperature of the lights was perfect. Just wish it fit my application.
customer_reviews.author: DrH

customer_reviews.title: So rare that a product is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They left NOTHING out of these awesome LEDS. Not only do they operate flawlessly on the multitude of brightness settings and operating modes, they hold their memory!!! Mine are plugged in and I operate them by a light switch. When I turn the on after being off all night they are at the setting I left them on. Absolutely awesome. The color is beautiful. Not yellow but not blue. The remote works great too. I am going to buy more just to have on hand. Doubt I will find any this nice ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and control options
customer_reviews.text: Color temp is fairly neutral, about 3500K on mine. Each individual LED varies a bit but not very noticeable unless you're looking for it. The control has some nice options, like separate buttons for each brightness (10%, 20%, 30%...) The control looks like something from 1974, but aesthetics aside I really like everything about this set.
customer_reviews.author: mjamazon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for nightlights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to line the stairs up to the second floor as a nightlight for my kids. I combined it withto click on at night just before bedtime and then off again when they (should!) be asleep. And then back on just before I wake them up for school. The light is soft and the dimming option is fantastic. Sometimes the remote can be a little wonky and you have to (sometimes) get real close to the receiver but it mostly behaves. Liked it so much I bought a second one for their bedroom to put along the ceiling as another night light with the same timer. No dead lights and it's holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel H. Shults

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights mainly to use for Christmas. However, I can see myself using them year round. They add such a nice touch to any room and the copper wire is so slim that your barely notice it rather than having ugly clunky wires hanging all over the place. Please note that the lights don't change color, but they too go from solid to flashing and from dim to bright controllable from a remote controller.
customer_reviews.author: House

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and full of features!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Gave our small screened in patio the 'ambiance' it needed. Love all of the settings on the remote to provide all kinds of features. The only short coming of the remote is you have to be on top of the receiving unit to to turn the lights on/off or activate the features. All in all a great light set and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Vbg

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They're very easy to handle and they're ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They're very easy to handle and they're long enough. I bought the two pack to decorate my bedroom. I used the regular transparent sticky tapes to put them on the wall. The remote is a very nice feature to have. It's infrared so you'll need clear sight of the remote box (i.e. don't hide it behind the curtain). The thing I like the most is that I can turn these off from my bed right before going to sleep. At 100%, they are actually very bright but if you dim them, you can give your room a nice atmosphere. They look really good and I'm actually thinking of purchasing more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Levente Juhasz

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Power Cord
customer_reviews.text: I have bought at least 5 of these string lights. I make vase lamps to give friends as gifts. Every one I bought was great except this one I bought a week ago. The power cord does not connect to the adapter perfectly. You have to turn it around many times to finally get it light up. Once you move it a bit, it loses the power. I have to give it as a gift tomorrow. Don't even have time to wait for a replacement. This worries me once I give it to my friend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wen

customer_reviews.title: Great, Long Lasting Product
customer_reviews.text: I can no longer remember how many of these I've ordered. I use them at home, inside and out; give them as gifts, and use them as components in art projects. None of this TaoTronics has yet to fail me. This, however, is the first one with a remote control. If, like all the others, it is good quality, I'm sure it will be fine. One word of advice, the longer the string of lights, the harder it is to deal with. I would suggest that two people handle anything over 30 feet to prevent tangling and subsequent frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great price easy used
customer_reviews.text: Amazing string led lights I bought this light string for outdoor Christmas decoration very nice hopefully it last i took it down for next year use
customer_reviews.author: QC Guy

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. I wanted something to put on the ceiling around my bed in case I didn't want the full room light on and I was not disappointed. I got the amber lights and the remote, set it up, turned off my light and was more than happy with the result. The remote works perfectly and I love the dimming option. If I want to read a book I can just set it to a low percentage and not bother my boyfriend when he goes to sleep. I'm not a fan of the other two options but each to their own. I'm very happy with this product and would happy buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these little lights. They are so versatile. I use them in my bedroom and the remote make them so convenient to use. When I'm ready for bed I just use the remote to turn them off and I never have to get out of bed. I ordered some for my daughter and my son for Christmas and the also love them. I need to get more for under the kitchen cabinets. I think they would work well under there...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Updated:  Seller corrected the issue  (Brightness changed)
customer_reviews.text: Updated: The seller contacted me and corrected the situation by providing me a new one. This is the second time I have bought this item. Last time was almost two years ago. The only change is that the brightness is half of what it was. Yes I checked the remote settings. Still like it just a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Philip K

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lights.  Updated:
customer_reviews.text: Update: these crapped out after about six months. I had two separate strands, set up in two locations on my house, and both died at almost the same time. They were pretty while the lasted... Original review: Beautiful lights that are easy to set up. The remote control was a little difficult to figure out at first until I read in other reviews that it needs to be pointed directly at the receiver. A lot of different "twinkly" options, but after playing with it for a bit I decided I like the solid lights the best so I probably won't be using the remote. They are very pretty though and I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Remote does not work
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Have to update my review. I did not reach out to the seller and only left this '-ve' review because I thought I was beyond the 30 day period. However, the seller automatically sent me another product to compensate for the defective one. I did a lot of research before buying these lights and the biggest reason I wanted them was because of the remote. Unfortunately, after a couple of times, the remote stops working. Now I have to plug them in and out every time :-/
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching and decorative year round!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one and the 66 ft. strand. They are both attractive and eye appealing. I put this strand above the cabinets in my kitchen for mood lighting. I wrapped the 66 ft. strand around my staircase. I use them both every night. The remote has many functions which I tried out but rarely use. The most used by me is the dim function. I'll probably be getting a few more strands in the future to put above my other cabinets and the rest of my stairs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Menard

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: These were half the price I would have gotten in the store with twice the functionality. They were much longer than I expected. At first I didn't realize they had a remote and the brightness could be adjusted. I loved them before I discovered this, now I am thrilled!! These brought my collection display cabinet to life. I am definitely ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Elbo Watson

customer_reviews.title: Magical!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much I bought two more sets. I have one set draped across two hanging planters and a mirror in the living room. They add a very beautiful "magical" touch. Wires are very bendable and easy to shape. The lights are tiny, but bright. The remote is very convenient for turning off and on. Have to admit that I haven't played with the other buttons to see what other effects are available. The fact that these lights are LEDs makes them super ecenomical. If you are looking for very versatile fairy effect lights, these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use, non-tangling, decorative LED lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these little lights. They’re quite bright even though the string weighs nothing. That makes it so easy to drape them over mantles and other odd-shaped items without having their weight pull them down. I also really like the remote’s ability to change the display, although the right-hand column on the remote is very hard to decipher with dark print on dark buttons. I think the instructions could explain the functions of the remote in much more detail. I certainly recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It delivers what it promises: beautiful, warm lights along a string, and a remote control that lets you make it dimmer or brighter (or, if you want, flash). My only gripe is that you can't connect multiple strings together: each one has to be plugged in separately. That definitely constrains how you set them up. Other than that, though, these are perfect. We've strung a couple of these up over some windows in an organic, haphazard way (not outlining the windows in a rectangle of light). The lights are delicate, they make the space look charming and cozy, and the wires do not look unsightly at all.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Great value with many functions!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this light set for a few weeks and love it. I hope that the set will last 18 months. If the set lasts that long and does not go up in price then I will be buying much more. The remote has many functions and the line of lights works well with indoor trees. Update: Set went out in 3 months but I loved the performance so much prior to the outage that I had to try it one more time and bought another one a couple weeks ago. Cross my fingers!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing & Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE! Bought a cheaper version of this product with no remote as a trial -I was so impressed I bought the TaoTronics dimmable with a remote. Amazing! In the box not so impressive but unwind and plug in and it is beautiful in so many applications. Best features: super bright yet no heat think of all the ways you could use that in home decor! The remote and dim-ability make it even better. Drape it behind curtains, a headboard, on top of kitchen cabinets and it provides fabulous light and looks gorgeous. I'll be buying extras for a Christmas tree this year!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi K

customer_reviews.title: Beyond disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Ordered a set and one of the wires snapped just trying to gently unravel it, straight out of the package. Sent those back and bought a second pair. They finally showed up (late) and these don't work at all! So frustrating. I need them for a project, but I'm going to have to send them back again and just look elsewhere for my lights.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Work and look great
customer_reviews.text: I put them in a large clear glass lemonade container which sits on top of our kitchen cabinets and they look and work great.
customer_reviews.author: LaBamba

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I used these for about 2.5 years in my room as ambient/area lighting. They have a nice warm feel and produce enough light to read from when bunched up or gently light a room when spread out. I used them for probably a couple hours a day most days I owned them so they're good for maybe 1,500 hours before they start losing some brightness. I ordered the 66 ft version as a replacement and love them as well.
customer_reviews.author: B Real

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Remote and/or Receiver
customer_reviews.text: The lights are pretty, but they only work when they are plugged in directly to the power. I either have a faulty remote or a faulty receiver, because the lights don't turn on at all if I use the receiver to connect the lights with power. I am quite disappointed, as I bought these specifically for the remote feature. If I wanted remote-less string lights, I could have purchased the cheaper version. Others have had good reviews, but I think the remote/receiver issue is not uncommon.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine I.

customer_reviews.title: Tangling headache
customer_reviews.text: This product was a nightmare from the start the wiring does not allow this product to have any decent draping and because its so stiff you constantly have to readjust. Once a section gets tangled I worried about breaking the wires trying to undo them. Lastly the controls didnt offer any nice random twinkling and I couldnt get it to stop blinking once they started... Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: a good tip would be to plug in and turn on ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews for products but these lights totally exceeded my expectations! although detangling them was a little tricky since I was over eager when installing them, it just took a few minutes and a little patience to unravel. a good tip would be to plug in and turn on the lights first to help with the untangling. i was really surprised that the lights also have so many different options / settings for brightness and pulsing/blinking. i used them along the baseboards of my bedroom to provide soft ambient lighting as a nice evening alternative to the overhead lights built into my apartment's ceiling. they provide a very lovely soft glow!
customer_reviews.author: vics

customer_reviews.title: Great lights; remote is not so great
customer_reviews.text: They’re beautiful and very nice looking, the star taken off is for the remote control not working as well as it should; I have to hit it several times while getting closer for it to work. Another reason for the star taken off is that the arrows on the remote don’t work. Other than this, the lights are perfect for my daughters room- they’re strung up underneath her top bunk for a reading area at night. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Mella Bella

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and bought these lights for my daughter birthday. We hung them up and they worked fine for about two weeks then half of the lights wouldn’t work. Now only 2 months later and all of them are completely dead. We missed our return date since my daughter just told me about this recently. For the money I expected a long life from this product. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: The cord keeps coming off
customer_reviews.text: I used this light for a while and I think it is really beautiful, but I have an big issue with these lights. The intersection where I connect the power adapter wire with the lights wire keeps coming off. Thus these lights won't stay on and keep flickering and turning off. I tried taping it so that they would stay but they won't. Even when the light is on, if I move my desk a little, the cords will disconnect and the light will turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: I loved how you can control aspects such as dimming and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one string of white lights and three or four of colored. I loved how you can control aspects such as dimming and flashing from the remote. I use this clear set to light up my staircase as night, on the dimmest setting. I have it set to a timer so that it automatically comes on at sundown and off at sunrise. It lights up the stairway, serving the function of a nightlight and also creates a more festive atmosphere. I also like how when stored, this string takes up minimum space and holds its form easily.
customer_reviews.author: just somebody ordinary

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best lights I have ever bought. I use them to decorate my bar and create a nice ambience. I have had them on for over a year. I don't know if I should do that, but I have and they are good as new! I highly recommend. I will never go back to the oldschool Christmas lights.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I seriously love these lights so so so much
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love these lights so so so much. They look absolutely beautiful, are super easy to hang up, and work like a charm. They don't get super hot or anything, and all the settings they have are so awesome. I bought one strand of these because I saw they were super discounted on Black Friday, and since then I've bought 3 more of the white and 1 of the colored! Absolutely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sharon hallett

customer_reviews.title: Great, bright lights!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, these lights are amazing! Your imagination is the limit to what you can do with these lights. I bought them over a year ago but they just sat in the closet until recently. I finally put them up around my gazebo and am now kicking myself for waiting so long. They are very bright and versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Armando Res

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our deck | GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these a couple years ago and only got around to putting them up on our deck about a month ago. They are super easy to put up and look fantastic, putting out enough light that we don't need additional light sources. They do not link to one another, but we found a way around that. Regarding the company's customer service: one of the power supplies failed after being left out in the rain (DON'T leave the power supplies connected if rain is in the forecast). I emailed TaoTronics and a week later a new power supply arrived in the mail. Very surprised and impressed.
customer_reviews.author: John in Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Neat decorative lighting solution for specialty purposes. So far no quality/durability issues.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up on sale without knowing exactly what I would use it for. We ended up using it with some cotton "snow" to go with a Christmas decorative scene. It worked very well for this purpose. The remote is a little finicky as the membrane buttons don't always consistently activate (or maybe the IR is just really weak), but for our usage, it served its purpose well enough, especially for the sale price for which I was able to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: Lights are awesome and so is the taotronics customer service. At first the remote would not work so I emailed them before going to bed. When I woke up they had already responded. 5 stars just for that kind of customer service. The lights are perfect. Remote controlled, dimmable for the perfect amount of light.... Will be buying a couple more strands for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grechko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my use: illuminating the interior of an outdoor gazeebo. The brightness (2 strings) and color of the light are ideal (to me), bright enough to read by and see other people but not so bright as to make it difficult to see out, and unobtrusive enough that they practically disappear once installed. We also usually have a fire going in ours. If you're looking for real working illumination, for a party or something, these would make a nice accent but probably wouldn't suffice for a primary light source. However for accent or a bit of supplemental light give these a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Bowlin

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!!! The price is reasonable and it's exactly what I was looking for. And I really like that we get a remote for it. My cat chewed through one though so now I gotta buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

product_meta.title: TaoTronics 33ft 100 LED String Lights TT-SL036 Dimmable with Remote Control, Waterproof Christmas Decorative Lights for Bedroom, Patio, Garden, Parties, Wedding. UL588 and TUVus Approved(Warm White)
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1

 TaoTronics - Enhance Your Life
Frequently Asked Questions:
1-Connected everything but it’s not working?
The lights need to be turned on with the Remote. Notice: Please use with the Remote pointing to the remote receiver. 

 2-Can you shorten the lights?
NO! Cutting the lights will damage the product as the end of copper wires is welded, it also voids your product warranty. 

 3-Can I use one control for 2 strings installed in my dorm room? (Not joined, separately).
Yes. Our lights use the same signal, so one remote can control multiple strings. 

 4- Is it safe to touch? or to hang on curtains or trees?
Yes! Adapter output is 5V, which is absolutely safe to touch(Critical harmless voltage for human body is 24V); low heat emission LEDs are free of fire hazards. 

 5-My dog chewed up the remote, where can I buy a replacement?
You can contact our customer service at support@taotronics.com for a free replacement of the remote. Feel free to contact us in case of any problem with the order. 

 Light Modes:
- Constant On:
Optional Brightness: 100%,90%,80%,70%,60%,50%,40%,30%,20%,10%;
- Smooth Mode:
Lights gradually fade in and out; Optional interval: 5s, 10s, 15s, 20s;
-Flash Mode:
Lights flash at a preset speed; Optional speed: 1Hz, 2Hz, 3Hz,FF(=fast flash). 

 Specification:
Color Temp.: 2700~2900K
Length: 33ft String + 5ft Adapter Cord
No. of LEDs: 100
LED Lifespan: 20,000 Hours
Input: AC 100~240V, 1A
Output: DC 5V, 1A
Receiver Range: 10m
Working Temp.: -4~140°F 

 Warm Tips
1. Do not apply excessive force or repetitively bend the same spot.
2. Do not extend the light or try to connect it with another lights.
3. TaoTronics offers 6-month extended warranty. 

 Includes:
1x33ft Lights
1xRemote(with Battery)
1xReceiver
1xAdapter
1xUser Guide
1xThank You Card
feature_bullets: Dimmable Led String Ligths: Updated Remote Controller with short-circuit protection, 10 levels brightness and adjustable flash/smooth/strobe can create vibrant, dynamic atmospheres.
Weatherproof Star Starry Light: Warm white-yellow Mini leds strings creates a warm, joyful, and festive ambience to delight your Christmas ,holiday or wedding.
Christmas Light: The insulated copper wire keeps the lights at a low temperature so they are safe to touch after many hours of use
Get Creative – Mold the copper lights into any shape you can think of. Please kindly note that the string light could not be extended or connected together.
Safe and Convenient : The low profile power adapter is easily hidden and is guaranteed with UL certification. Comes with a 5 foot adapter cord and 33 feet of lighting wire with 100 individual LEDs.
Note: connectors between the led string light and the controller should be pushed to the remark line for firm connection and waterproof purpose.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars6,386 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
